_comment: Session config template. Copy and customize for each work session. Generated configs go to scripts/configs/. Old configs archived to scripts/configs/archive/.

panes.name: Agent Name
panes.prompt: You are the Agent Name agent for {{PROJECT_NAME}}, working autonomously in a parallel session. FIRST STEPS: 1. Read .claude-agent.md in this directory. 2. Read CLAUDE.md. 3. Read relevant knowledge docs. YOUR ASSIGNMENT: Branch: feat/component-description. Issues: #N. Owned paths: src/component/. ISSUE DETAILS: ... VALIDATION before EACH commit: lint, format, test. GIT WORKFLOW: conventional commits, push after each unit, reference issues. BEGIN NOW.
